cantrips.name: Fire Bolt
cantrips.description: Hurl a mote of fire at a creature. 1d10 fire damage.

cantrips.name: Mage Hand
cantrips.description: Conjure a spectral hand to manipulate objects at a distance.

cantrips.name: Light
cantrips.description: Touch an object to make it shed bright light.

cantrips.name: Ray of Frost
cantrips.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light. 1d8 cold damage.

cantrips.name: Shocking Grasp
cantrips.description: Lightning springs from your hand. 1d8 lightning damage.

cantrips.name: Prestidigitation
cantrips.description: Perform minor magical tricks and illusions.

cantrips.name: Acid Splash
cantrips.description: Hurl a bubble of acid. 1d6 acid damage.

cantrips.name: Minor Illusion
cantrips.description: Create a sound or an image of an object.

cantrips.name: Poison Spray
cantrips.description: Extend your hand and project a puff of noxious gas. 1d12 poison damage.

level1.name: Magic Missile
level1.description: Three darts of magical force strike their target. 1d4+1 force damage each.

level1.name: Shield
level1.description: An invisible barrier grants +5 AC until your next turn.

level1.name: Mage Armor
level1.description: Touch a creature to surround them with protective force. AC 13 + Dex modifier.

level1.name: Detect Magic
level1.description: Sense the presence of magic within 30 feet.

level1.name: Identify
level1.description: Learn the properties of a magical object or spell affecting a creature.

level1.name: Burning Hands
level1.description: A thin sheet of flames shoots from your hands. 3d6 fire damage.

level1.name: Charm Person
level1.description: Attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range.

level1.name: Sleep
level1.description: Send creatures into a magical slumber. 5d8 hit points of creatures.

level1.name: Thunderwave
level1.description: A wave of thunderous force. 2d8 thunder damage and push 10 feet.

level1.name: Feather Fall
level1.description: Choose up to 5 falling creatures to slow their descent.

level1.name: Grease
level1.description: Slick grease covers the ground in a 10-foot square.

level1.name: Fog Cloud
level1.description: Create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog.

cantrips.name: Sacred Flame
cantrips.description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature. 1d8 radiant damage.

cantrips.name: Guidance
cantrips.description: Touch a creature to grant it 1d4 to one ability check.

cantrips.name: Light
cantrips.description: Touch an object to make it shed bright light.

cantrips.name: Spare the Dying
cantrips.description: Touch a dying creature to stabilize it.

cantrips.name: Thaumaturgy
cantrips.description: Manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power.

cantrips.name: Resistance
cantrips.description: Touch a creature to grant it 1d4 to one saving throw.

cantrips.name: Mending
cantrips.description: Repair a single break or tear in an object.

level1.name: Cure Wounds
level1.description: Touch a creature to restore hit points. 1d8 + spellcasting modifier.

level1.name: Bless
level1.description: Bless up to 3 creatures. They add 1d4 to attacks and saves.

level1.name: Guiding Bolt
level1.description: A flash of light streaks toward a creature. 4d6 radiant damage.

level1.name: Healing Word
level1.description: Speak a word of healing to restore hit points. 1d4 + modifier.

level1.name: Shield of Faith
level1.description: A shimmering field surrounds a creature, granting +2 AC.

level1.name: Command
level1.description: Speak a one-word command to a creature within range.

level1.name: Detect Evil and Good
level1.description: Sense the presence of aberrations, celestials, fiends, or undead.

level1.name: Sanctuary
level1.description: Ward a creature. Attackers must make a Wisdom save to target it.

level1.name: Inflict Wounds
level1.description: Make a melee spell attack. 3d10 necrotic damage.

level1.name: Create or Destroy Water
level1.description: Create or destroy up to 10 gallons of water.

cantrips.description: Hurl a mote of fire at a creature. 1d10 fire damage.

cantrips.name: Prestidigitation

level1.name: Armor of Agathys
level1.description: A protective magical force surrounds you. Gain 5 temporary hit points.

level1.name: Arms of Hadar
level1.description: Summon tendrils of dark energy. 2d6 necrotic damage.

level1.name: Hex
level1.description: Place a curse on a creature. Extra 1d6 necrotic damage.

level1.name: Hellish Rebuke
level1.description: Point your finger and the creature is engulfed in flames. 2d10 fire damage.

level1.name: Witch Bolt
level1.description: A beam of crackling energy. 1d12 lightning damage initially.
